description: This Dart source file defines the CatalogService class, which provides methods to interact with a backend API for retrieving book and category data, including listing books with filters, fetching a single book by ID, and listing categories.

classes.name: CatalogService
classes.description: A service class that provides methods to access book and category data from a backend API, acting as a client interface for catalog operations.

methods.name: listBooks
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of books, with optional filters like query, author, category, price range, and pagination parameters.

methods.name: getBook
methods.description: Retrieves a single book by its unique identifier.

methods.name: listCategories
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of categories, with optional query filter and pagination parameters.
